author: bodewig
msg: Treat OS/2 like Win NT with regard to <exec>'s dir attribute.

author: bodewig
msg: Make filtering of the copy tasks work with leading @ characters.

author: bodewig
msg: Various checks for required attributes and better error messages added.

author: bodewig
msg: Fixed situation where Class.getClassLoader returns null for the
bootstrap class loader - JDK 1.1.7 on Linux for example.

author: stefano
msg: Updated this task so that you can have <classpath> inside that tells the Available where to look for classes and resources. It is completely back compatible so should cause any harm to anybody.
